title: Income Tax (Transfer Pricing) (Amendment) Regulations, 2021
content:
31st December, 2021 Statutory Instruments 781
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 107 OF 2021
The Income Tax Act
(Laws, Volume 19, Cap 323)
The Income Tax (Transfer Pricing) (Amendment)
Regulations, 2021
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in sections 97C and 97D of
the Income Tax Act, the following Regulations are made:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Income Tax Title and
(Transfer Pricing) (Amendment) Regulations, 2021, and shall be commencement
read as one with the Income Tax (Transfer Pricing) Regulations, S.I. No. 20 of
2000, in these Regulations referred to as the principal Regulations. 2000
(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on 1st
January, 2022, and shall have effect in relation to the charge of tax
for the charge year ending on 31st December, 2022, and to each
subsequent charge year.
2. Regulation 10 of the principal Regulations is amended by Amendment
the deletion of the words “section 97A (2)” and the substitution of Regulation
10
therefor of the words “section 97A (1)”.
3. Regulation 11 of the principal Regulations is amended by Amendment
the deletion of the words “section 97A (2)” and the substitution of Regulation
11
therefor of the words “section 97A (1)”.
4. Regulation 22A of the principal Regulations is amended— Amendment
of Regulation
(a) in sub-regulation (1) by the deletion of the definition of
22A
“excluded multi-national enterprise group” and the
substitution therefor of the following:
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O. Box 30136, 10101 Lusaka. Price K 12.00 each.
782 Statutory Instruments 31st December, 2021
“excluded multi-national enterprise group” means, with
respect to an accounting year of the group, a group
having a total consolidated group revenue of less than
four thousand seven hundred and ninety-five million
Kwacha during the accounting year immediately
preceding the reporting accounting year as reflected in
the group’s consolidated financial statements for the
preceding accounting year;
(b) by the deletion of subregulation (4) and the substitution
therefor of the following:
(4) The standard template of a country-by-country
report shall be—
(a) in the Form set out in the Schedule; and
(b) submitted manually or electronically.
(c) in subregulation (7) by the deletion of
paragraph (d) and the substitution therefor
of the following:
(d) the State of tax residence of the surrogate
parent entity is notified in accordance with
this subregulation by the constituent entity
resident tax purposes in its jurisdiction, that
it is the surrogate parent entity;; and
(d) by the deletion of the word “system”
wherever the word appears and the
substitution therefor with the word
“systemic”.
Amendment 5. The principal Regulations are amended by the deletion of
to the the Schedule to the Regulations and the substitution therefor of the
Schedule Schedule set out in the Appendix.
